name: Island Mystery
description:
Island Mystery is a fun, story-driven RPG created in RPG Maker.

The game starts following a father and son who have been mysteriously transported to an Island. Strange things happen on the Island and they immediately need to muster up all of the courage to help save the Island.

The game gives you more than just story, as you have a number of side-quests and fun extras. Including a treasure hunt and a casino!

Pay as you feel with a minimum of 99 cents for an incredibly fun experience!
